reviewText: I purchased this for a 9 year old boy who was teaching himself how to Salsa. When he saw that I was giving him this as a surprise gift he was 100% delighted! The joy of giving was amazing. Now, he has to report to me when he gets some of his moves down!  I will write another review on that!
Pretty good video. Our salsa is now better and it was easy to follow.
Disappointed. Was looking for a stronger display of beginner  moves. Wasted my money but live and learn!
I was not happy with the picture quality

Do you love to dance, then there can not be anything better than Salsa. A perfect dance form for different events. The DVD helps you to get answers to all that you have ever wanted to ask someone regarding Salsa. It has really helped me get hold on my performance. Now I am just wonderful in any dance competition. It has worked for me, and am sure will work for you also.

Learning how to salsa was always something that intrigued me. When I was younger I took about a 30 minute sample lesson with a school trip that I was on and absolutely loved it. As a result, I really wanted to learn. Watching Lyndsie and Ryan dance made me think I really want to know how to do that. And I actually learned how to do it just by watching this video. I love that they walk you through each step one at a time and they make sure to do everything slowly before gradually increasing speed. So you have plenty of time to catch on before you have to try doing it faster (especially since the salsa is a fast dance anyway). I love this video and cant wait to show off my new skills.

i just loved salsa but i had some difficulty to do salsa dance.i would really say this DVD worked as a choreographer and i made me expert in salsa in a week. After watching the video,i taught the dance to some of friends at college and they were really enjoyed and wondering how did i become so expert in salsa in a very short time so all the credit goes to Salsa DVD.i would recommend others to
buy it as its really useful.
